alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 7:17PM PST until February 28 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate snow has been observed along state highway 218 near Prindle Hill and Highway 207 near Heppner and Spray Mountain. Snow showers will continue through the evening hours then will taper off after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
